title: Client Constantly Crashes
body:
So every few games sometimes every game the client will crash. It doesnt affect the actual game when I am playing but at the end of the game I have to restart the League client and login again. I tried updating my video drivers and nothing seems to be fixing the problem. Anybody have any tips? Also it seems if I leave my client on for some time without playing a game the client also crashes. I have been having this problem for a few months now. It is doesnt affect my game play but it is so annoying not being able to see the end game lobby and  having to login again almost every game. Any tips will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

replies.body:
From your description, it definitely sounds like some sort of issue with the connection between our PvP.net Servers and your computer.  This would explain why you get into the game (and don't experience any issues) and why the end-of-game stats screen never appears.  The best step you can take to resolve this is to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has some of the most common solutions that should help stabilize your connection.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing any issues!
Hey is there a fix for the champion select bug yet?Please contact your colleagues if you haven't heard anything yet :)
No updates I can provide just yet about players being locked out of getting into the lobby.  We are still hoping to get this resolved as quickly as we can.  I'll provide more info once I have it!
It is not a connection issue. If it was why would the game still run until the end. It is the client that crashes.
